publicwhip.spmotion: S1M-51 Fergus Ewing: Salmon farming—That the Parliament acknowledges the importance of the salmon farming industry to Scotland and calls upon the Scottish Ministers to— bring forward effective measures to address the crisis in the industry caused by the impact of Infectious Salmon Anaemia; ensure that any financial package implemented protects employment in the industry; make representations to Her Majesty’s Government regarding an urgent application to the European Union for financial assistance; and, promote measures to allow salmon producers to obtain insurance for their stock. (lodged on 11 June)
